title: pH of 4 acids - major species in 1.0 M soln acid 1

content.description:
Refer to the following.

The pH of solutions of four acids prepared at various concentrations were measured and recorded in the table above.

The four acids are, in no particular order, chlorous, hydrochloric, lactic, and propanoic.
content.question: Of the following species, which has the greatest concentration in a 1.0 M solution of acid 1 at equilibrium?

skill.text: 4.A: Predict and/or explain chemical properties or phenomena (e.g., of atoms or molecules) using given chemical theories, models, and representations.
